## Evals


```{r cars}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(moderndive)
library(gapminder)
library(skimr)

evals_ch6 <- evals %>%
  select(score, bty_avg, age)
evals_ch6

# Fit regression model:
score_model <- lm(score ~ bty_avg, data = evals_ch6)
# Get regression table:
get_regression_table(score_model)

# Get regression points
get_regression_points(score_model)
```
